metadata.title: CVE-2023-31493 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: RCE (Remote Code Execution) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.36.33 as anattacker can create a new .php log file in language folder, while executinga crafted payload and escalate privileges allowing execution of anycommands on the remote system.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
